languages.text: "Не смею претендовать на сходство с великой святой. Это — грех". {n}Регина Зауэрбэк отвечает приветливо и спокойно, но то и дело посматривает на супруга.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Не смею претендовать на сходство с великой святой. Это — грех". {n}Регина Зауэрбек отвечает приветливо и спокойно, но то и дело посматривает на супруга.{/n}

languages.text: "I wouldn't dream of claiming to bear any resemblance to a great saint. That would be blasphemy." {n}Regina's voice is friendly and calm, but she keeps glancing at her husband.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Не смею претендовать на сходство с великой святой. Это — грех". {n}Регина Зауэрбэк отвечает приветливо и спокойно, но то и дело посматривает на супруга.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "I wouldn't dream of claiming to bear any resemblance to a great Saint. That would be a sin." {n}Regina's voice is friendly and calm, but she keeps glancing at her husband.{/n}
"I wouldn't dream of claiming to bear any resemblance to a great Saint. That would be a sin." {n}Regina's voice is friendly and calm, but she keeps glancing at her husband.{/n}
"I wouldn't dream of claiming to bear any resemblance to a great saint. That would be a sin." {n}Regina's voice is friendly and calm, but she keeps glancing at her husband.{/n}
"I wouldn't dream of claiming to bear any resemblance to a great saint. That would be a sin." {n}Regina's voice is friendly and calm, but she keeps glancing at her husband.{/n}
"I wouldn't dream of claiming to bear any resemblance to a great saint. That would be blasphemy." {n}Regina's voice is friendly and calm, but she keeps glancing at her husband.{/n}

languages.text: 「偉大な聖人と似ているだなんて、夢にも思いません。そのように考えることが冒涜です」{n}レジーナの声は穏やかで優しいが、ちらちらと夫の方を見ている。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I wouldn't dream of claiming to bear any resemblance to a great saint. That would be blasphemy." {n}Regina's voice is friendly and calm, but she keeps glancing at her husband.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「偉大な聖人と似ているだなんて、夢にも思いません。そのように考えることが冒涜です」{n}レジーナの声は穏やかで優しいが、ちらちらと夫の方を見ている。{/n}

languages.text: “我不敢奢望自己与那位伟大的圣人有任何相似之处，那会是亵渎之举。”{n}蕾吉娜的声音友好而平静，但却一直在瞥着她的丈夫。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I wouldn't dream of claiming to bear any resemblance to a great saint. That would be blasphemy." {n}Regina's voice is friendly and calm, but she keeps glancing at her husband.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我不敢奢望自己与那位伟大的圣人有任何相似之处，那会是亵渎之举。”{n}蕾吉娜的声音友好而平静，但却一直在瞥着她的丈夫。{/n}

languages.text: «Jamás me aventuraría a compararme con una santa mayor. Sería una blasfemia». {n}Regina te hace ojitos antes de bajar recatadamente la mirada.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I wouldn't dream of claiming to bear any resemblance to a great saint. That would be blasphemy." {n}Regina's voice is friendly and calm, but she keeps glancing at her husband.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Jamás me aventuraría a compararme con una santa mayor. Sería una blasfemia». {n}Regina te hace ojitos antes de bajar recatadamente la mirada.{/n}

languages.text: « Jamais je n'oserais prétendre ressembler à une sainte. Ce serait un blasphème. » {n}Régina reste amicale, mais ne cesse de jeter des coups d'œil en direction de son mari.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I wouldn't dream of claiming to bear any resemblance to a great saint. That would be blasphemy." {n}Regina's voice is friendly and calm, but she keeps glancing at her husband.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Jamais je n'oserais prétendre ressembler à une sainte. Ce serait un blasphème. » {n}Régina reste amicale, mais ne cesse de jeter des coups d'œil en direction de son mari.{/n}

languages.text: "Es fiele mir nicht im Traum ein, irgendeine Ähnlichkeit mit einer großen Heiligen zu beanspruchen. Das wäre Blasphemie." {n}Reginas Stimme ist freundlich und ruhig, aber ihr Blick bleibt auf ihren Mann gerichtet.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I wouldn't dream of claiming to bear any resemblance to a great saint. That would be blasphemy." {n}Regina's voice is friendly and calm, but she keeps glancing at her husband.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Es fiele mir nicht im Traum ein, irgendeine Ähnlichkeit mit einer großen Heiligen zu beanspruchen. Das wäre Blasphemie." {n}Reginas Stimme ist freundlich und ruhig, aber ihr Blick bleibt auf ihren Mann gerichtet.{/n}

languages.text: "Haşa, yüce azizeyi andırdığımı iddia etmek bile yakışıksız kaçar. Dine aykırılık etmiş olurum." {n}Regina'nın sesi cana yakın ve sakin çıksa da göz ucuyla kocasına bakıp duruyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I wouldn't dream of claiming to bear any resemblance to a great saint. That would be blasphemy." {n}Regina's voice is friendly and calm, but she keeps glancing at her husband.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Haşa, o yüce azizeyi andırdığımı bile iddia etmek bana yakışmaz. Günaha girmiş olurum." {n}Regina'nın sesi cana yakın ve sakin olsa da, göz ucuyla kocasına bakıp duruyor.{/n}
